casebody.data:
SPECTRUM HEALTH HOSPITALS, Mary Free Bed Rehabilitation Hospital, and Mary Free Bed Medical Group Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
GEICO GENERAL INSURANCE COMPANY and GEICO Indemnity Company, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 158999
COA: 341353 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 13, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendants-appellees to extend the time for filing their answer is GRANTED. The answer submitted on March 8, 2019, is accepted as timely filed.
